sources.title: Almost Dead (1994) Shannen Doherty | The ghosts wonâ€™t rest. Can she solve the mystery?
sources.description:
Psychologist Katherine Roshak's twin research takes a phantom detour, when she sees ghostly messages from her dead mother Angela, pushing her to uncover a dark plan.  With Dominic Delaserra's help, they race to stop Eddie Herbek before the ghost's final move traps Katherine forever.

Director: Ruben Preuss
Writers: Miguel Tejada-Flores, William Valtos 

Main cast:
Shannen Doherty - Katherine Roshak
Costas Mandylor - Dominic Delaserra
John Diehl - Eddie Herbek
William R. Moses - Jim Schneider
Steve Inwood - Police Chief
Eric Christmas - Father Ambrose
Penelope Branning - Angela Roshak
Roy Brocksmith - Kuranda
Wren T. Brown - Bednarek
William Allen Young - Henzes

Genres: Supernatural Horror, Thriller, Mystery
Release date: March 20, 1994

00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
05:19 Gaslighting #1: Dr. Schneider dismisses "grief hallucinations"
16:17 Gaslighting #2: Detective mocks grave investigation
26:07 Gaslighting #3: Police Chief threatens arrest
31:47 Gaslighting #4: Jim suggests institutionalization



https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A psychology professor (Shannen Doherty) believes that she is being haunted by her dead mother in this film that plays like a low-budget made-for-tv flick.
metadata.Actors: Shannen Doherty, Costas Mandylor, John Diehl
